Endpoints.Name: Send a verification code
Comments: Sends a temporary verification code via email, which must subsequently be passed in a Reset Password call. The verification code expires in 120 minutes.

Fields.Name: ClientID
Fields.Description: ID of the client. Required.

Fields.Name: Email
Fields.Description: Email of the password reset request.

Fields.Name: Username
Fields.Description: Username of the password reset request.

Fields.Name: URL
Fields.Description: URL of the password reset request.

Endpoints.Name: Reset a password by verification code

Parameters.Name: verificationCode
Parameters.Description: Verification code of the password reset.

Fields.Name: ClientID
Fields.Description: ID of the client. Required.

Fields.Name: Username
Fields.Description: Username of the password reset. Required.

Fields.Name: Password
Fields.Description: Password of the password reset.

Endpoints.Name: Retrieve a username
Comments: Sends an email with username for every username associated with an email. Always returns a 200 success regardless of if email doesn’t exist in the clientID.

Parameters.Name: clientID
Parameters.Description: ID of the client.

Parameters.Name: email
Parameters.Description: Email of the forgotten credentials.

Resources.Name: Impersonation Configs
Comments: ImpersonationConfigs allow users to make API calls on behalf of a buyer user, which we refer to as impersonation.
If you're a marketplace owner user with the BuyerImpersonation role you can impersonate any buyer user under your organization as long as an applicable Impersonation Config has been created.
If you're a buyer user with the BuyerImpersonation role you can impersonate any other buyer user within the same buyer company as long as an applicable Impersonation Config has been created.

Parameters.Name: impersonationConfigID
Parameters.Description: ID of the impersonation config.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the impersonation config.

Fields.Name: ImpersonationBuyerID
Fields.Description: The Buyer ID of the impersonator group or user (party doing the impersonating)

Fields.Name: ImpersonationGroupID
Fields.Description: The UserGroupID of the impersonator (party doing the impersonating)

Fields.Name: ImpersonationUserID
Fields.Description: The UserID of the impersonator (party doing the impersonating)

Fields.Name: BuyerID
Fields.Description: The BuyerID of the impersonatee (party being impersonated). If null, the config can be used to impersonate users in any buyer in the marketplace that is able to access the specified ClientID.

Fields.Name: GroupID
Fields.Description: The UserGroupID of the impersonatee (party being impersonated)

Fields.Name: UserID
Fields.Description: The UserID of the impersonatee (party being impersonated)

Fields.Name: SecurityProfileID
Fields.Description: ID of the security profile.

Fields.Name: ClientID
Fields.Description: ID of the client.

Endpoints.Name: Get a single cert public key
Comments: Returns a JSON Web Key (JWK). Can be used for validating the token was signed by OrderCloud.

Parameters.Name: ID
Parameters.Description: ID of the public key.

Fields.Name: kty
Fields.Description: Kty of the public key.

Fields.Name: n
Fields.Description: N of the public key.

Fields.Name: e
Fields.Description: E of the public key.

Fields.Name: alg
Fields.Description: Alg of the public key.

Fields.Name: use
Fields.Description: Use of the public key.

Fields.Name: kid
Fields.Description: Kid of the public key.

Parameters.Name: openidconnectID
Parameters.Description: ID of the openidconnect.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of this OpenID Connect configuration object. Each object allows authentication to one OrderCloud ApiClient through one Identity Providing Party.

Fields.Name: OrderCloudApiClientID
Fields.Description: An ID that references an OrderCloud ApiClient.

Fields.Name: ConnectClientID
Fields.Description: An app ID from the Identity Provider that is required to get JWT tokens.

Fields.Name: ConnectClientSecret
Fields.Description: A secret string from the Identity Provider that grants access to get JWT tokens.

Fields.Name: AppStartUrl
Fields.Description: A URL on your front-end ordering site where users will be redirected after they authenticate through the Identity Provider. The string "{token}" will be replaced with a valid OrderCloud JWT.

Fields.Name: AuthorizationEndpoint
Fields.Description: A publicly known URL from the Identity Provider that redirects to a resource where users enter personal credentials.

Fields.Name: TokenEndpoint
Fields.Description: A publicly known URL from the Identity Provider where agents can get JWT tokens.

Fields.Name: UrlEncoded
Fields.Description: If true, uses a url encoded form post with all auth values. Otherwise, an Authorization header with basic auth is passed with a JSON object in the body.

Fields.Name: IntegrationEventID
Fields.Description: ID of the IntegrationEvent to call upon authorization request. Used when you haven't pre-populated users into OrderCloud, or need to sync user data.

Fields.Name: CallSyncUserIntegrationEvent
Fields.Description: If true, the integration event is always triggered regardless of if the user already exists in OrderCloud.

Fields.Name: IntegrationEventName
Fields.Description: Integration event name of the open id connect.

Fields.Name: AdditionalIdpScopes
Fields.Description: Any additional scopes needed by the IDP.

Fields.Name: CustomErrorUrl
Fields.Description: A URL on your front-end ordering site where users will be redirected if an error occurs while trying to authenticate.

Resources.Name: Admin Users

Fields.Description: Company name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 3. Sortable.

Fields.Name: FirstName
Fields.Description: First name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 8. Sortable.

Fields.Name: LastName
Fields.Description: Last name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 7. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Street1
Fields.Description: Street 1 of the address. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 5. Sortable.

Fields.Description: Phone of the address. Max length 100 characters. Sortable.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: Used for OAuth 2.0 workflows and OrderCloud impersonation to represent this Client Application.

Fields.Name: ClientSecret
Fields.Description: Enables the OAuth 2.0 Client Credentials grant type. Required on all OAuth workflows when present.

Fields.Name: AccessTokenDuration
Fields.Description: Access token duration of the api client.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: All user authentication is prohibited if false.

Fields.Name: AppName
Fields.Description: App name of the api client.

Fields.Name: RefreshTokenDuration
Fields.Description: Refresh token duration of the api client.

Fields.Name: DefaultContextUserName
Fields.Description: Optionally set a user that will be used when authenticating with a Client Credentials grant type flow. This grant type is often used for anonymous browsing on buyer applications and authentication on server integration layers.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the api client.

Fields.Name: AllowAnyBuyer
Fields.Description: Allow all buyer users in your organization access to authenticate using this ApiClient.

Fields.Name: AllowAnySupplier
Fields.Description: Allow all supplier users in your organization access to authenticate using this ApiClient.

Fields.Name: AllowSeller
Fields.Description: Allow all marketplace owner users in your organization access to authenticate using this ApiClient.

Fields.Name: IsAnonBuyer
Fields.Description: Enables anonymous shopping. It only works when a Buyer User is the Default Context User.

Fields.Name: AssignedBuyerCount
Fields.Description: Assigned buyer count of the api client.

Fields.Name: AssignedSupplierCount
Fields.Description: Assigned supplier count of the api client.

Fields.Name: OrderCheckoutIntegrationEventID
Fields.Description: If populated, an error will be thrown when attempting to submit an order that has not been processed through the OrderCheckout Integration.

Fields.Name: OrderCheckoutIntegrationEventName
Fields.Description: Order checkout integration event name of the api client.

Fields.Name: OrderReturnIntegrationEventID
Fields.Description: If populated, and not overriden by an OrderAdmin, the integration event will be used to calculate ReturnAmount on the Order Return or each individual return item.

Fields.Name: OrderReturnIntegrationEventName
Fields.Description: Order return integration event name of the api client.

Fields.Name: AddToCartIntegrationEventID
Fields.Description: If populated, the integration event will be used to fetch product information from an external system, instead of an OrderCloud catalog, when a line item is added to an unsubmitted order.

Fields.Name: AddToCartIntegrationEventName
Fields.Description: Add to cart integration event name of the api client.

Fields.Name: MinimumRequiredRoles
Fields.Description: Minimum required roles of the api client.

Fields.Name: MinimumRequiredCustomRoles
Fields.Description: Minimum required custom roles of the api client.

Fields.Name: MaximumGrantedRoles
Fields.Description: Maximum granted roles of the api client.

Fields.Name: MaximumGrantedCustomRoles
Fields.Description: Maximum granted custom roles of the api client.

Endpoints.Name: Get a list of API clients

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

ResponseBody.Sample:
{
  "Meta": {
    "Page": 1,
    "PageSize": 20,
    "TotalCount": 25,
    "TotalPages": 2,
    "ItemRange": [
      1,
      20
    ],
    "NextPageKey": null
  },
  "Items": [
    {
      "ID": "",
      "ClientSecret": "",
      "AccessTokenDuration": 0,
      "Active": false,
      "AppName": "",
      "RefreshTokenDuration": 0,
      "DefaultContextUserName": "",
      "xp": {},
      "AllowAnyBuyer": false,
      "AllowAnySupplier": false,
      "AllowSeller": false,
      "IsAnonBuyer": false,
      "AssignedBuyerCount": 0,
      "AssignedSupplierCount": 0,
      "OrderCheckoutIntegrationEventID": "",
      "OrderCheckoutIntegrationEventName": "",
      "OrderReturnIntegrationEventID": "",
      "OrderReturnIntegrationEventName": "",
      "AddToCartIntegrationEventID": "",
      "AddToCartIntegrationEventName": "",
      "MinimumRequiredRoles": [
        "ApiClientAdmin"
      ],
      "MinimumRequiredCustomRoles": [
        ""
      ],
      "MaximumGrantedRoles": [
        "ApiClientAdmin"
      ],
      "MaximumGrantedCustomRoles": [
        ""
      ]
    }
  ]
}

Resources.Name: Incrementors
Comments: An incrementor is used to add an atomically incremented number to your object IDs. For example, "aprefix-{myIncrementorID}", will yield an order ID of aprefix-10010.

Parameters.Name: incrementorID
Parameters.Description: ID of the incrementor.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: The string "{replace-with-incrementor-ID}" can be passed into any ID field to populate the next ID in the sequence. It can also be prefixed with other ID safe characters.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the incrementor.

Fields.Name: LastNumber
Fields.Description: Increments as IDs are generated.

Fields.Name: LeftPaddingCount
Fields.Description: Use to enforce a minimum incrementor ID length. For example if your LastNumber is 0 and LeftPaddingCount is 4, your first generated ID will be 0001.

Resources.Name: Spending Accounts
Comments: Spending Accounts are funds given to users by a managing entity and are managed as part of a user's account.  These funds are generally used as "corporate dollars", "rewards dollars", or "gift cards".
They can be used to pay for all of or part of an order with parameters that control account expiration, balance available, balance renewal, user access and overdraft.
Multiple spending accounts can be assigned to a member of an organization and applied to all transactions, but only one can be used as a payment method.
When multiple Spending Accounts are used on a transaction each is deducted individually.

Parameters.Description: ID of the buyer.

Fields.Description: Start date of the spending account.

Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the spending account.

Resources.Name: Approval Rules
Comments: Approval rules are used to verify the integrity of an order.  Common examples include orders requiring managerial approval, approval for orders that contain a specific product category, approval for quantity thresholds or approval for orders that exceed a specific price.  Properties are also available to control the triggers and timing for processing approvals whether parallel to another rule, or in succession of a previous rule.

Parameters.Name: buyerID
Parameters.Description: ID of the buyer.

Parameters.Name: approvalRuleID
Parameters.Description: ID of the approval rule.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the approval rule.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the approval rule.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the approval rule.

Fields.Name: ApprovingGroupID
Fields.Description: ID of the approving group.

Fields.Name: RuleExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine an order requires approval. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the approval rule.

Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the Product. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Fields.Name: DefaultPriceScheduleID
Fields.Description: When provided, no explicit PriceSchedule assignment is required. When a PriceSchedule assignment exists, it will override any default provided.

Fields.Name: AutoForward
Fields.Description: If true, when this product is ordered by a Buyer, it will automatically be added to a new Order from the Marketplace Owner to the Default Supplier and submitted. Requires a valid DefaultSupplierID.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the product.

Fields.Name: ParentID
Fields.Description: ID of the parent product. If not null, IsParent should be false

Fields.Name: IsParent
Fields.Description: If true, ParentID must be null, as a parent product cannot have a parent itself.

Fields.Name: IsBundle
Fields.Description: If true, IsParent must be false, as a parent product cannot be a bundle.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the product.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the product.

Fields.Name: QuantityMultiplier
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior. Used to indicate an amount per Quantity.

Fields.Name: ShipWeight
Fields.Description: Ship weight of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipHeight
Fields.Description: Ship height of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipWidth
Fields.Description: Ship width of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipLength
Fields.Description: Ship length of the product.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: If false, product is not visible or purchasable from the Shopper perspective.

Fields.Name: SpecCount
Fields.Description: Count of Specs assigned to the product.

Fields.Name: VariantCount
Fields.Description: Count of Variants generated from the product/spec combinations.

Fields.Name: ShipFromAddressID
Fields.Description: Marketplace Owner or Supplier AddressID where the product will be shipped from. Can be used to calculate shipping costs.

Fields.Name: Inventory
Fields.Description: Inventory of the product.

Fields.Name: DefaultSupplierID
Fields.Description: If this property has a value and a SupplierID isn't explicitly passed when creating a LineItem, this SupplierID will be used.

Fields.Name: AllSuppliersCanSell
Fields.Description: If true, all suppliers are eligible to opt into selling this product.

Fields.Name: Returnable
Fields.Description: Returnable of the product.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the product.

Resources.Name: Products
Comments: A Product represents a physical, digital, or abstract good that is offered for sale by a Marketplace Owner or Supplier and is purchase-able by Buyer Users via an Order.
Products can be a static SKU or a version of a static SKU, known as a Variant.  For example, a variant is often a size or color choice that drives a different product SKU.
Products may also have inventory associated with them and various inventory attributes like quantity available and re-order notifications.

Parameters.Name: productID
Parameters.Description: ID of the product.

ResponseBody.Sample:
{
  "OwnerID": "",
  "DefaultPriceScheduleID": "",
  "AutoForward": false,
  "ID": "",
  "ParentID": "",
  "IsParent": false,
  "IsBundle": false,
  "Name": "",
  "Description": "",
  "QuantityMultiplier": 0,
  "ShipWeight": 0,
  "ShipHeight": 0,
  "ShipWidth": 0,
  "ShipLength": 0,
  "Active": false,
  "SpecCount": 0,
  "VariantCount": 0,
  "ShipFromAddressID": "",
  "Inventory": {
    "Enabled": false,
    "NotificationPoint": 0,
    "VariantLevelTracking": false,
    "OrderCanExceed": false,
    "QuantityAvailable": 0,
    "LastUpdated": "2018-01-01T00:00:00-06:00"
  },
  "DefaultSupplierID": "",
  "AllSuppliersCanSell": false,
  "Returnable": false,
  "xp": {}
}

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the Product. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Fields.Name: DefaultPriceScheduleID
Fields.Description: When provided, no explicit PriceSchedule assignment is required. When a PriceSchedule assignment exists, it will override any default provided.

Fields.Name: AutoForward
Fields.Description: If true, when this product is ordered by a Buyer, it will automatically be added to a new Order from the Marketplace Owner to the Default Supplier and submitted. Requires a valid DefaultSupplierID.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the product.

Fields.Name: ParentID
Fields.Description: ID of the parent product. If not null, IsParent should be false

Fields.Name: IsParent
Fields.Description: If true, ParentID must be null, as a parent product cannot have a parent itself.

Fields.Name: IsBundle
Fields.Description: If true, IsParent must be false, as a parent product cannot be a bundle.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the product.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the product.

Fields.Name: QuantityMultiplier
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior. Used to indicate an amount per Quantity.

Fields.Name: ShipWeight
Fields.Description: Ship weight of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipHeight
Fields.Description: Ship height of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipWidth
Fields.Description: Ship width of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipLength
Fields.Description: Ship length of the product.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: If false, product is not visible or purchasable from the Shopper perspective.

Fields.Name: SpecCount
Fields.Description: Count of Specs assigned to the product.

Fields.Name: VariantCount
Fields.Description: Count of Variants generated from the product/spec combinations.

Fields.Name: ShipFromAddressID
Fields.Description: Marketplace Owner or Supplier AddressID where the product will be shipped from. Can be used to calculate shipping costs.

Fields.Name: Inventory
Fields.Description: Inventory of the product.

Fields.Name: DefaultSupplierID
Fields.Description: If this property has a value and a SupplierID isn't explicitly passed when creating a LineItem, this SupplierID will be used.

Fields.Name: AllSuppliersCanSell
Fields.Description: If true, all suppliers are eligible to opt into selling this product.

Fields.Name: Returnable
Fields.Description: Returnable of the product.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the product.

Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the Spec. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the spec.

Fields.Name: ListOrder
Fields.Description: List order of the spec.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the spec.

Fields.Name: DefaultValue
Fields.Description: If no Spec.Value is passed in the LineItemSpec, this value will be used.

Fields.Name: Required
Fields.Description: Required of the spec.

Fields.Name: AllowOpenText
Fields.Description: For Spec options that are not pre-defined, such as FirstName for a business card.

Fields.Name: DefaultOptionID
Fields.Description: This property can only be written to after both the Spec and Option have been created. If no Spec.OptionID is passed in the LineItemSpec, this option will be used.

Fields.Name: DefinesVariant
Fields.Description: If true, each unique combinations of this Spec's Options should map to a unique Product Variant.

Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the spec.

Fields.Description: Option count of the spec.

Resources.Name: Price Schedules
Comments: Price schedules allow the same product to be sold across multiple channels.  A price schedule may include quantity price breaks, min and max quantity per order, whether to apply tax or shipping calculations, or to what type of order the price schedule applies.

Parameters.Name: priceScheduleID
Parameters.Description: ID of the price schedule.

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the PriceSchedule. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the price schedule.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the price schedule.

Fields.Name: ApplyTax
Fields.Description: For reference only for calculating tax, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: ApplyShipping
Fields.Description: For reference only for calculating shipping cost, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: MinQuantity
Fields.Description: The minimum quantity allowed per order.

Fields.Name: MaxQuantity
Fields.Description: The maximum quantity allowed per order.

Fields.Name: UseCumulativeQuantity
Fields.Description: If true, LineItem quantities will be aggregated by productID when determining which price break applies, and when Min/Max quantities are met. Else, each LineItem is treated separately.

Fields.Name: RestrictedQuantity
Fields.Description: If true, this product can only be ordered in quantities that exactly match one of the price breaks on this schedule.

Fields.Name: PriceBreaks
Fields.Description: Price breaks of the price schedule.

Fields.Name: Currency
Fields.Description: We recommend using ISO-4217 Currency Codes for compatibility with tax and payment processors.

Fields.Name: SaleStart
Fields.Description: Optional. Starting date/time for PriceBreak.SalePrice to be used as the price for the LineItem. Requires that the PriceBreak.SalePrice value is set.

Fields.Name: SaleEnd
Fields.Description: Optional. Ending date/time for PriceBreak.SalePrice to be used as the price for the LineItem. Requires that the PriceBreak.SalePrice value is set.

Fields.Name: IsOnSale
Fields.Description: True when at least one PriceBreak has a SalePrice defined, and it falls between the SaleStart and SaleEnd date, if applicable.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the price schedule.

Endpoints.Name: Get a list of price schedules

Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Resources.Name: Specs
Comments: Specs are used to capture user input when adding a Product to an Order. At its simplest, a spec is a name/value pair. A spec value may have a price markup or markdown associated with it. In more advanced scenarios, specs can drive the product SKU. For example, a product may be available in 3 colors and 3 sizes and therefore have a total of 9 SKUs. **The OrderCloud platform will choose the correct SKU based on the user-selected color and size specs**.

Parameters.Name: specID
Parameters.Description: ID of the spec.

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the Spec. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the spec.

Fields.Name: ListOrder
Fields.Description: List order of the spec.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the spec.

Fields.Name: DefaultValue
Fields.Description: If no Spec.Value is passed in the LineItemSpec, this value will be used.

Fields.Name: Required
Fields.Description: Required of the spec.

Fields.Name: AllowOpenText
Fields.Description: For Spec options that are not pre-defined, such as FirstName for a business card.

Fields.Name: DefaultOptionID
Fields.Description: This property can only be written to after both the Spec and Option have been created. If no Spec.OptionID is passed in the LineItemSpec, this option will be used.

Fields.Name: DefinesVariant
Fields.Description: If true, each unique combinations of this Spec's Options should map to a unique Product Variant.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the spec.

Fields.Name: OptionCount
Fields.Description: Option count of the spec.

Fields.Name: Options
Fields.Description: Options of the spec.

Resources.Name: Product Facets
Comments: A product facet is an extended property (value on product.xp) designated to participate in faceted navigation. Buyer list endpoints for products will populate and return Meta.Facets, a collection of facet names, values, and counts. Counts represent the total results that would be returned should the current set be further filtered on that facet value.

Parameters.Name: productFacetID
Parameters.Description: ID of the product facet.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the product facet.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the product facet.

Fields.Name: XpPath
Fields.Description: Optional. Identifies full path to xp field used for this facet. If not provided, facet value assumed to be stored at product.xp.{facet ID}.

Fields.Name: ListOrder
Fields.Description: List order of the product facet.

Fields.Name: MinCount
Fields.Description: Minimum count required or a facet value to be returned in list metadata. Default is 1. If you want zero-count values returned, set this to 0.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the product facet.

Resources.Name: Inventory Records
Comments: Inventory Records represent physical locations where inventory for a given product exists. Use of Inventory Records will prevent writing to Product.Inventory.QuantityAvailable, which will instead be a sum of inventories across all locations associated to the product.

Parameters.Name: productID
Parameters.Description: ID of the product.

Parameters.Name: inventoryRecordID
Parameters.Description: ID of the inventory record.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the inventory record.

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the owner.

Fields.Name: AllowAllBuyers
Fields.Description: Allow inventory record to be used by all buyers in your Marketplace without creating explicit assignments, defaults to true.

Fields.Name: Address
Fields.Description: Address of the inventory record.

Fields.Name: AddressID
Fields.Description: Since an InventoryRecord represents a physical location where inventory for a given product exists, AddressID is required.

Fields.Name: OrderCanExceed
Fields.Description: Order can exceed of the inventory record.

Fields.Name: QuantityAvailable
Fields.Description: Quantity available of the inventory record.

Fields.Name: LastUpdated
Fields.Description: Last updated of the inventory record.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the inventory record.

Resources.Name: Orders
Comments: An Order represents a business transaction between two parties. It typically consists of a collection of Line Items, a Payment Method, Tax and Shipping information, etc. The OrderCloud platform defines various "actions" that can be performed against Orders, such as Submit, Approve, Ship, etc. These actions transform the state of the order and often trigger external events such as financial transactions.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Name: FromUser
Fields.Description: User placing the order.

Fields.Name: FromCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Buyer or Marketplace Owner placing the order. Mainly useful to the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving it.

Fields.Name: ToCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving the order, only writable on create. Mainly useful to the user placing it.

Fields.Name: FromUserID
Fields.Description: This property is only writable when creating an order on behalf of a buyer user.

Fields.Name: BillingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the billing address.

Fields.Name: BillingAddress
Fields.Description: Billing address of the order.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the Shipping Address for all LineItems on the Order. Null when there are multiple Shipping Addresses involved.

Fields.Name: Comments
Fields.Description: Comments of the order.

Fields.Name: LineItemCount
Fields.Description: Line item count of the order.

Fields.Name: Status
Fields.Description: Status of the order. Possible values: Unsubmitted, AwaitingApproval, Declined, Open, Completed, Canceled.

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the order.

Fields.Name: DateSubmitted
Fields.Description: NULL until the order passes from the buyer to the Marketplace Owner, including when Status is PendingApproval.

Fields.Name: DateApproved
Fields.Description: Date approved of the order.

Fields.Name: DateDeclined
Fields.Description: Date declined of the order.

Fields.Name: DateCanceled
Fields.Description: Date canceled of the order.

Fields.Name: DateCompleted
Fields.Description: Populated when all items on an order have shipped, or the order is explicitly completed.

Fields.Name: LastUpdated
Fields.Description: Last updated of the order.

Fields.Name: Subtotal
Fields.Description: Sum of all LineItem.LineSubtotals.

Fields.Name: ShippingCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires OverrideShipping Role.

Fields.Name: TaxCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires TaxOverride Role.

Fields.Name: PromotionDiscount
Fields.Description: Sum of all Promotion.Amounts applied to the order.

Fields.Name: Currency
Fields.Description: Inherited from the user placing the order.

Fields.Name: Total
Fields.Description: Subtotal + TaxCost + ShippingCost - PromotionDiscount

Fields.Name: IsSubmitted
Fields.Description: True if this Order has been passed from the Buyer to the Marketplace Owner.

Fields.Name: SubscriptionID
Fields.Description: ID of the subscription used to create an order in an automated process.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the order.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: buyerID
Parameters.Description: ID of the buyer.

Parameters.Name: supplierID
Parameters.Description: ID of the supplier.

Parameters.Name: from
Parameters.Description: Lower bound of date range that the order was created.

Parameters.Name: to
Parameters.Description: Upper bound of date range that the order was created.

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: searchType
Parameters.Description: Type of search to perform. Possible values: AnyTerm (default), AllTermsAnyField, AllTermsSameField, ExactPhrase, ExactPhrasePrefix.

Parameters.Name: pageSize

Fields.Description: ID of the order. Can only contain characters Aa-Zz, 0-9, -, and _. Searchable: priority level 1. Sortable.

Fields.Name: FromCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Buyer or Marketplace Owner placing the order. Mainly useful to the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving it.

Fields.Name: ToCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving the order, only writable on create. Mainly useful to the user placing it.

Fields.Name: FromUserID
Fields.Description: This property is only writable when creating an order on behalf of a buyer user.

Fields.Name: BillingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the billing address.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the Shipping Address for all LineItems on the Order. Null when there are multiple Shipping Addresses involved.

Fields.Name: Comments
Fields.Description: Comments of the order. Max length 2000 characters. Searchable: priority level 4.

Fields.Name: ShippingCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires OverrideShipping Role.

Fields.Name: TaxCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires TaxOverride Role.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the order.

Endpoints.Name: Get a list of order approvals
Comments: Returns all Approvals associated with the Order.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

Fields.Name: AllowResubmit
Fields.Description: If true, the submitting user will be able to modify the order and resubmit for approval.

Fields.Name: ApprovalRuleID
Fields.Description: ID of the approval rule.

Fields.Name: ApprovingGroupID
Fields.Description: ID of the approving group.

Fields.Name: Status
Fields.Description: Status of the order approval. Possible values: Pending, Approved, Declined.

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the order approval.

Fields.Name: DateCompleted
Fields.Description: Date completed of the order approval.

Fields.Name: Approver
Fields.Description: Approver of the order approval.

Fields.Name: Comments
Fields.Description: Comments of the order approval.

Comments: Returns all Users who can approve or decline this order (but have not done so).

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the user.

Fields.Description: Can be used in conjunction with SecurityProfile.PasswordConfig to enforce password reset schedules.

Endpoints.Name: Split an order
Comments: Creates, but does not submit, 0 or more outgoing Orders to Suppliers, one for each unique Product.DefaultSupplierID on this Order.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Name: OutgoingOrders
Fields.Description: The outgoing Orders created, one for each unique Product.DefaultSupplierID on the original Order.

Fields.Name: RemainingLineItemIDs
Fields.Description: IDs of Line Items not added to an outgoing Order, most likely because Product.DefaultSupplierID is not set.

Endpoints.Name: Forward an order
Comments: Creates and submits 0 or more outgoing Orders to Suppliers, one for each unique Product.DefaultSupplierID on this Order.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Name: OutgoingOrders
Fields.Description: The outgoing Orders created, one for each unique Product.DefaultSupplierID on the original Order.

Fields.Name: RemainingLineItemIDs
Fields.Description: IDs of Line Items not added to an outgoing Order, most likely because Product.DefaultSupplierID is not set.

Endpoints.Name: Complete an order
Comments: Use only when an order doesn't need a shipment. You will not be able to ship or reopen an order after completing it.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Name: FromUser
Fields.Description: User placing the order.

Fields.Name: FromCompanyID

Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Description: ID of the shipment. Can only contain characters Aa-Zz, 0-9, -, and _. Searchable: priority level 1. Sortable.

Fields.Name: BuyerID
Fields.Description: ID of the buyer. Searchable: priority level 1. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Shipper
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: DateShipped
Fields.Description: In order to properly trigger OrderShipped emails, this date must be NULL on initial POST. Update with the date only when all of the Shipment items have been created. Once all of an order's items exist on a shipment that has a DateShipped the OrderShipped email will trigger and Order.Status will be updated to Complete.

Fields.Name: DateDelivered
Fields.Description: Date delivered of the shipment. Searchable: priority level 4. Sortable.

Fields.Name: TrackingNumber
Fields.Description: Tracking number of the shipment. Max length 3000 characters. Searchable: priority level 4.

Fields.Name: Cost
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the Shipment. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the shipment.

Fields.Description: Account of the shipment.

Comments: Use only when the address is not to be saved/reused. To use a saved address (i.e. from the Addresses resource), PATCH the order's ShippingAddressID property instead. The address used will be populated on the ShippingAddress property of each LineItem.

Fields.Name: State

Fields.Name: Country
Fields.Description: Country of the address. Required. Max length 2 characters. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Phone
Fields.Description: Phone of the address. Max length 100 characters. Sortable.

Fields.Name: AddressName
Fields.Description: Address name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 2. Sortable: priority level 1.

Comments: Only FirstName, LastName, and Email can be updated.
Primarily used to facilitate guest checkout scenarios.

Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Fields.Name: Username
Fields.Description: Must be unique across the Marketplace.

Fields.Name: Password
Fields.Description: Password of the user.

Fields.Name: FirstName
Fields.Description: First name of the user. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 4. Sortable: priority level 2.

Fields.Name: LastName
Fields.Description: Last name of the user. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 3. Sortable: priority level 1.

Fields.Name: Email
Fields.Description: Email of the user. Required. Max length 200 characters. Searchable: priority level 5. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Phone
Fields.Description: Phone of the user. Max length 100 characters.

Fields.Name: TermsAccepted
Fields.Description: Terms accepted of the user.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: If false, authentication is prohibited.

Endpoints.Name: List eligible promotions
Comments: Get a list of promotions eligible for an order.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the promotion.

Fields.Name: LineItemLevel
Fields.Description: If true, certain eligible expression requirements must be met, and the PromotionDiscount will be applied at the line item level.

Fields.Name: Code
Fields.Description: Must be unique. Entered by buyer when adding promo to order.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the promotion.

Fields.Name: RedemptionLimit
Fields.Description: Limit the total number of orders this promotion can be applied to across all users.

Fields.Name: RedemptionLimitPerUser
Fields.Description: Limit the total number of orders this promotion can be applied to per user.

Fields.Name: RedemptionCount
Fields.Description: The number of times this promotion has been applied to an order.

Fields.Name: ItemLimitPerOrder
Fields.Description: Can only be used when LineItemLevel is true. Limits the number of items the promotion will apply to when eligible. When no ItemSortBy is defined, items will be sorted by DateAdded ascending.

Fields.Name: ItemSortBy
Fields.Description: Comma delimited list of properties to sort by. Can only be used when ItemLimitPerOrder is true. Used to determine the order in which the promotion is applied to the specified limit of items. Use ! to reverse sort order on a property.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the promotion.

Fields.Name: FinePrint
Fields.Description: Terms, conditions, and other legal jargon.

Fields.Name: StartDate
Fields.Description: Start date of the promotion.

Fields.Name: ExpirationDate
Fields.Description: Expiration date of the promotion.

Fields.Name: EligibleExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine if an item or order is eligible for a promotion. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: ValueExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine the discount amount of an eligible promotion. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: CanCombine
Fields.Description: If true, the promotion can be applied to an order that already other promotions applied, as long as they can also be combined.

Fields.Name: AllowAllBuyers
Fields.Description: Allow promo to be used by all buyers in your Marketplace without creating explicit assignments.

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the Promotion. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Fields.Name: AutoApply
Fields.Description: Auto apply of the promotion.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: Active of the promotion.

Fields.Name: Priority
Fields.Description: Used to control the order in which promotions are applied when calling the auto apply endpoint.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the promotion.

Endpoints.Name: Add a promotion to an order

Resources.Name: Cart
Comments: The Cart is a straightforward way for a buyer user to interact with an order prior to submit. Unlike Order endpoints, an OrderID is never needed to interact with the cart. This simplifies workflows and eliminates the need to keep track of the OrderID on the front end. Please note Cart should be used as a distinct alternative to Order endpoints for a buyer user during the shopping experience; combining the use of Cart endpoints with Order endpoints may have unexpected results, and is not supported. Only available to Buyer Users.

Endpoints.Name: Get a single cart
Comments: If the ID of the Order returned is null, the cart has not yet been interacted with. Once an item is added, the Order.ID will be populated.

Endpoints.Name: Delete a cart
Comments: Empties the cart. Any promotions, payments or other items associated with the cart will also be removed.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the order. Can only contain characters Aa-Zz, 0-9, -, and _. Searchable: priority level 1. Sortable.

Fields.Name: FromCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Buyer or Marketplace Owner placing the order. Mainly useful to the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving it.

Fields.Name: ToCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving the order, only writable on create. Mainly useful to the user placing it.

Fields.Name: FromUserID
Fields.Description: This property is only writable when creating an order on behalf of a buyer user.

Fields.Name: BillingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the billing address.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the Shipping Address for all LineItems on the Order. Null when there are multiple Shipping Addresses involved.

Fields.Name: Comments
Fields.Description: Comments of the order. Max length 2000 characters. Searchable: priority level 4.

Fields.Name: ShippingCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires OverrideShipping Role.

Fields.Name: TaxCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires TaxOverride Role.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the order.

Fields.Name: Status

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the order.

Fields.Name: DateSubmitted
Fields.Description: NULL until the order passes from the buyer to the Marketplace Owner, including when Status is PendingApproval.

Fields.Name: DateCanceled

Fields.Name: LastUpdated

Endpoints.Name: Get a list of cart promotions

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

ResponseBody.Sample:
{
  "Meta": {
    "Page": 1,
    "PageSize": 20,
    "TotalCount": 25,
    "TotalPages": 2,
    "ItemRange": [
      1,
      20
    ],
    "NextPageKey": null
  },
  "Items": [
    {
      "Amount": 0,
      "LineItemID": "",
      "AmountOverridden": false,
      "DateApplied": "2018-01-01T00:00:00-06:00",
      "ID": "",
      "LineItemLevel": false,
      "Code": "",
      "Name": "",
      "RedemptionLimit": 0,
      "RedemptionLimitPerUser": 0,
      "RedemptionCount": 0,
      "ItemLimitPerOrder": 0,
      "ItemSortBy": "",
      "Description": "",
      "FinePrint": "",
      "StartDate": "2018-01-01T00:00:00-06:00",
      "ExpirationDate": "2018-01-01T00:00:00-06:00",
      "EligibleExpression": "",
      "ValueExpression": "",
      "CanCombine": false,
      "AllowAllBuyers": false,
      "OwnerID": "",
      "AutoApply": false,
      "Active": false,
      "Priority": 0,
      "xp": {}
    }
  ]
}

Fields.Name: Amount
Fields.Description: Amount of the order promotion.

Fields.Name: LineItemID
Fields.Description: ID of the line item.

Fields.Name: AmountOverridden
Fields.Description: True when the Amount has been set via PromotionOverrides.

Fields.Name: DateApplied
Fields.Description: Date applied of the order promotion.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the order promotion.

Fields.Name: LineItemLevel
Fields.Description: If true, certain eligible expression requirements must be met, and the PromotionDiscount will be applied at the line item level.

Fields.Name: Code
Fields.Description: Must be unique. Entered by buyer when adding promo to order.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the order promotion.

Fields.Name: RedemptionLimit
Fields.Description: Limit the total number of orders this promotion can be applied to across all users.

Fields.Name: RedemptionLimitPerUser
Fields.Description: Limit the total number of orders this promotion can be applied to per user.

Fields.Name: RedemptionCount
Fields.Description: The number of times this promotion has been applied to an order.

Fields.Name: ItemLimitPerOrder
Fields.Description: Can only be used when LineItemLevel is true. Limits the number of items the promotion will apply to when eligible. When no ItemSortBy is defined, items will be sorted by DateAdded ascending.

Fields.Name: ItemSortBy
Fields.Description: Comma delimited list of properties to sort by. Can only be used when ItemLimitPerOrder is true. Used to determine the order in which the promotion is applied to the specified limit of items. Use ! to reverse sort order on a property.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the order promotion.

Fields.Name: FinePrint
Fields.Description: Terms, conditions, and other legal jargon.

Fields.Name: StartDate
Fields.Description: Start date of the order promotion.

Fields.Name: ExpirationDate
Fields.Description: Expiration date of the order promotion.

Fields.Name: EligibleExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine if an item or order is eligible for a promotion. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: ValueExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine the discount amount of an eligible promotion. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: CanCombine
Fields.Description: If true, the promotion can be applied to an order that already other promotions applied, as long as they can also be combined.

Fields.Name: AllowAllBuyers
Fields.Description: Allow promo to be used by all buyers in your Marketplace without creating explicit assignments.

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the Promotion. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Fields.Name: AutoApply
Fields.Description: Auto apply of the order promotion.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: Active of the order promotion.

Fields.Name: Priority
Fields.Description: Used to control the order in which promotions are applied when calling the auto apply endpoint.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the order promotion.

Endpoints.Name: List eligible promotions
Comments: Get a list of promotions eligible for the cart.

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

      "AllowAllBuyers": false,
      "OwnerID": "",
      "AutoApply": false,
      "Active": false,

    }
  ]
}

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Name: FromUser
Fields.Description: User placing the order.

Fields.Name: FromCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Buyer or Marketplace Owner placing the order. Mainly useful to the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving it.

Fields.Name: ToCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving the order, only writable on create. Mainly useful to the user placing it.

Fields.Name: FromUserID
Fields.Description: This property is only writable when creating an order on behalf of a buyer user.

Fields.Name: BillingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the billing address.

Fields.Name: BillingAddress
Fields.Description: Billing address of the order.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the Shipping Address for all LineItems on the Order. Null when there are multiple Shipping Addresses involved.

Fields.Name: Comments
Fields.Description: Comments of the order.

Fields.Name: LineItemCount
Fields.Description: Line item count of the order.

Fields.Name: Status
Fields.Description: Status of the order. Possible values: Unsubmitted, AwaitingApproval, Declined, Open, Completed, Canceled.

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the order.

Fields.Name: DateSubmitted
Fields.Description: NULL until the order passes from the buyer to the Marketplace Owner, including when Status is PendingApproval.

Fields.Name: DateApproved
Fields.Description: Date approved of the order.

Fields.Name: DateDeclined
Fields.Description: Date declined of the order.

Fields.Name: DateCanceled
Fields.Description: Date canceled of the order.

Fields.Name: DateCompleted
Fields.Description: Populated when all items on an order have shipped, or the order is explicitly completed.

Fields.Name: LastUpdated
Fields.Description: Last updated of the order.

Fields.Name: Subtotal
Fields.Description: Sum of all LineItem.LineSubtotals.

Fields.Name: ShippingCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires OverrideShipping Role.

Fields.Name: TaxCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires TaxOverride Role.

Fields.Name: PromotionDiscount
Fields.Description: Sum of all Promotion.Amounts applied to the order.

Fields.Name: Currency
Fields.Description: Inherited from the user placing the order.

Fields.Name: Total
Fields.Description: Subtotal + TaxCost + ShippingCost - PromotionDiscount

Fields.Name: IsSubmitted
Fields.Description: True if this Order has been passed from the Buyer to the Marketplace Owner.

Fields.Name: SubscriptionID
Fields.Description: ID of the subscription used to create an order in an automated process.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the order.

Endpoints.Name: Update cart FromUser
Comments: Only FirstName, LastName, and Email can be updated.
Primarily used to facilitate guest checkout scenarios.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the user. Can only contain characters Aa-Zz, 0-9, -, and _. Searchable: priority level 1. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Username
Fields.Description: Must be unique across the Marketplace.

Fields.Name: Password
Fields.Description: Password of the user.

Fields.Name: FirstName
Fields.Description: First name of the user. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 4. Sortable: priority level 2.

Fields.Name: LastName
Fields.Description: Last name of the user. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 3. Sortable: priority level 1.

Fields.Name: Email
Fields.Description: Email of the user. Required. Max length 200 characters. Searchable: priority level 5. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Phone
Fields.Description: Phone of the user. Max length 100 characters.

Fields.Name: TermsAccepted
Fields.Description: Terms accepted of the user.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: If false, authentication is prohibited.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the user.

Fields.Description: Only writeable on POST.

Fields.Description: If null, Payment applies to order total (or total of specific Line Items, if set), minus any other Payments where Amount is set. Value can only be negative if processing a payment for an OrderReturn.

Fields.Name: Accepted
Fields.Description: All payments must be Accepted to submit an order. This property should be updated after authorizing or capturing the payment in your middleware by a user with the elevated OrderAdmin role.

Fields.Name: OrderReturnID
Fields.Description: Used to indicate this payment is associated with an Order Return.

Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the payment.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the payment transaction. Can only contain characters Aa-Zz, 0-9, -, and _. Searchable: priority level 1. Sortable.

Fields.Description: Type of the payment transaction. Required. Sortable.

Fields.Name: DateExecuted
Fields.Description: Date executed of the payment transaction. Required. Sortable: priority level 1.

Fields.Name: Currency
Fields.Description: Usually the same as Payment Currency, but can be different. A marketplace may capture funds from the buyer user in one currency and process a payout to the seller in another.

Fields.Name: Amount
Fields.Description: Usually the same as Payment Amount, but can be different. A charge might have a subsequent partial credit, for example.

Fields.Name: Succeeded
Fields.Description: Succeeded of the payment transaction. Sortable.

Fields.Name: ResultCode
Fields.Description: Result code of the payment transaction. Sortable.

Fields.Name: ResultMessage
Fields.Description: Result message of the payment transaction. Sortable.

Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the payment transaction.

Endpoints.Name: Set a shipping address
Comments: Use only when the address is not to be saved/reused. To use a saved address (i.e. from the Addresses resource), PATCH the order's ShippingAddressID property instead. The address used will be populated on the ShippingAddress property of each LineItem.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the address. Can only contain characters Aa-Zz, 0-9, -, and _. Searchable: priority level 1. Sortable: priority level 2.

Fields.Name: CompanyName
Fields.Description: Company name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 3. Sortable.

Fields.Name: FirstName
Fields.Description: First name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 8. Sortable.

Fields.Name: LastName
Fields.Description: Last name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 7. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Street1
Fields.Description: Street 1 of the address. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 5. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Street2
Fields.Description: Street 2 of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 6. Sortable.

Fields.Name: City
Fields.Description: City of the address. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 4. Sortable.

Fields.Name: State
Fields.Description: State of the address. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 9. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Zip
Fields.Description: Zip of the address. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 10. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Country
Fields.Description: Country of the address. Required. Max length 2 characters. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Phone
Fields.Description: Phone of the address. Max length 100 characters. Sortable.

Fields.Name: AddressName
Fields.Description: Address name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 2. Sortable: priority level 1.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the address.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Name: FromUser
Fields.Description: User placing the order.

Fields.Name: FromCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Buyer or Marketplace Owner placing the order. Mainly useful to the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving it.

Fields.Name: ToCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving the order, only writable on create. Mainly useful to the user placing it.

Fields.Name: FromUserID
Fields.Description: This property is only writable when creating an order on behalf of a buyer user.

Fields.Name: BillingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the billing address.

Fields.Name: BillingAddress
Fields.Description: Billing address of the order.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the Shipping Address for all LineItems on the Order. Null when there are multiple Shipping Addresses involved.

Fields.Name: Comments
Fields.Description: Comments of the order.

Fields.Name: LineItemCount
Fields.Description: Line item count of the order.

Fields.Name: Status
Fields.Description: Status of the order. Possible values: Unsubmitted, AwaitingApproval, Declined, Open, Completed, Canceled.

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the order.

Fields.Name: DateSubmitted
Fields.Description: NULL until the order passes from the buyer to the Marketplace Owner, including when Status is PendingApproval.

Fields.Name: DateApproved
Fields.Description: Date approved of the order.

Fields.Name: DateDeclined
Fields.Description: Date declined of the order.

Fields.Name: DateCanceled
Fields.Description: Date canceled of the order.

Fields.Name: DateCompleted
Fields.Description: Populated when all items on an order have shipped, or the order is explicitly completed.

Fields.Name: LastUpdated
Fields.Description: Last updated of the order.

Fields.Name: Subtotal
Fields.Description: Sum of all LineItem.LineSubtotals.

Fields.Name: ShippingCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires OverrideShipping Role.

Fields.Name: TaxCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires TaxOverride Role.

Fields.Name: PromotionDiscount
Fields.Description: Sum of all Promotion.Amounts applied to the order.

Fields.Name: Currency
Fields.Description: Inherited from the user placing the order.

Fields.Name: Total
Fields.Description: Subtotal + TaxCost + ShippingCost - PromotionDiscount

Fields.Name: IsSubmitted
Fields.Description: True if this Order has been passed from the Buyer to the Marketplace Owner.

Fields.Name: SubscriptionID
Fields.Description: ID of the subscription used to create an order in an automated process.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the order.

Fields.Name: BillingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the billing address.

Fields.Name: BillingAddress
Fields.Description: Billing address of the order.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the Shipping Address for all LineItems on the Order. Null when there are multiple Shipping Addresses involved.

Fields.Name: Comments
Fields.Description: Comments of the order.

Fields.Name: LineItemCount
Fields.Description: Line item count of the order.

Fields.Name: Status
Fields.Description: Status of the order. Possible values: Unsubmitted, AwaitingApproval, Declined, Open, Completed, Canceled.

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the order.

Fields.Name: DateSubmitted
Fields.Description: NULL until the order passes from the buyer to the Marketplace Owner, including when Status is PendingApproval.

Fields.Name: DateApproved
Fields.Description: Date approved of the order.

Fields.Name: DateDeclined
Fields.Description: Date declined of the order.

Fields.Name: DateCanceled
Fields.Description: Date canceled of the order.

Fields.Name: DateCompleted
Fields.Description: Populated when all items on an order have shipped, or the order is explicitly completed.

Fields.Name: LastUpdated
Fields.Description: Last updated of the order.

Fields.Name: Subtotal
Fields.Description: Sum of all LineItem.LineSubtotals.

Fields.Name: ShippingCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires OverrideShipping Role.

Fields.Name: TaxCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires TaxOverride Role.

Fields.Name: PromotionDiscount
Fields.Description: Sum of all Promotion.Amounts applied to the order.

Fields.Name: Currency
Fields.Description: Inherited from the user placing the order.

Fields.Name: Total
Fields.Description: Subtotal + TaxCost + ShippingCost - PromotionDiscount

Fields.Name: IsSubmitted
Fields.Description: True if this Order has been passed from the Buyer to the Marketplace Owner.

Fields.Name: SubscriptionID
Fields.Description: ID of the subscription used to create an order in an automated process.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the order.

Resources.Name: Line Items
Comments: A Line Item represents a single line on an Order. At a minimum, it contains a single Product SKU and a quantity. A line item may also include Spec values, a Cost Center, shipping details, date needed, and other custom information.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Parameters.Name: lineItemID
Parameters.Description: ID of the line item.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the line item.

Fields.Name: ProductID
Fields.Description: ID of the product.

Fields.Name: Quantity
Fields.Description: Quantity of the line item.

Fields.Name: BundleItemID
Fields.Description: The ID of the Line Item that represents the bundle. Signifies that the Product is being purchased as part of a Bundle.

Fields.Name: IsBundle
Fields.Description: When true, this item represents a Bundle being purchased.

Fields.Name: DateAdded
Fields.Description: Date added of the line item.

Fields.Name: QuantityShipped
Fields.Description: Sum of QuantityShipped from all shipment items.

Fields.Name: UnitPrice
Fields.Description: Auto calculated Price per Quantity. Modification requires OverrideUnitPrice Role.

Fields.Name: PromotionDiscount
Fields.Description: Sum of all line item level promotion discount amounts applied.

Fields.Name: LineTotal
Fields.Description: LineSubtotal - PromotionDiscount

Fields.Name: LineSubtotal
Fields.Description: UnitPrice x Quantity

Fields.Name: CostCenter
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: DateNeeded
Fields.Description: Date needed of the line item.

Fields.Name: ShippingAccount
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the shipping address.

Fields.Name: ShipFromAddressID
Fields.Description: Marketplace Owner or Supplier AddressID where the product will be shipped from. Can be used to calculate shipping costs.

Fields.Name: Product
Fields.Description: Product of the line item.

Fields.Name: Variant
Fields.Description: Variant of the line item.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddress
Fields.Description: Shipping address of the line item.

Fields.Name: ShipFromAddress
Fields.Description: Ship from address of the line item.

Fields.Name: SupplierID
Fields.Description: ID of the supplier.

Fields.Name: InventoryRecordID
Fields.Description: Inventory Record ID of which product inventory location to use. The Inventory Record ID cannot be modified once an order is submitted.

Fields.Name: PriceScheduleID
Fields.Description: ID of the Price Schedule used to determine Unit price.

Fields.Name: IsOnSale
Fields.Description: True when the price schedule and price break has an active SalePrice.

Fields.Name: PriceOverridden
Fields.Description: If true, UnitPrice was overwritten.

Fields.Name: Specs
Fields.Description: Specs of the line item.

Fields.Name: IncomingOrderID
Fields.Description: ID of the original order. Only returns a value for the Marketplace Owner.

Fields.Name: OutgoingOrderID
Fields.Description: ID of the split or forwarded order. Only returns a value for the Marketplace Owner.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the line item.

Endpoints.Name: Get a list of line items

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

Endpoints.Name: Set a shipping address
Comments: Set the Shipping Address of the Line Item. Appropriate only when the Address is not to be saved/reused. To use a Saved Address (i.e. from the Addresses resource), PATCH the Line Item's ShippingAddressID property instead.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Parameters.Name: lineItemID
Parameters.Description: ID of the line item.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the address. Can only contain characters Aa-Zz, 0-9, -, and _. Searchable: priority level 1. Sortable: priority level 2.

Fields.Name: CompanyName
Fields.Description: Company name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 3. Sortable.

Fields.Name: FirstName
Fields.Description: First name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 8. Sortable.

Fields.Name: LastName
Fields.Description: Last name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 7. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Street1
Fields.Description: Street 1 of the address. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 5. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Street2
Fields.Description: Street 2 of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 6. Sortable.

Fields.Name: City
Fields.Description: City of the address. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 4. Sortable.

Fields.Name: State
Fields.Description: State of the address. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 9. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Zip
Fields.Description: Zip of the address. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 10. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Country
Fields.Description: Country of the address. Required. Max length 2 characters. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Phone
Fields.Description: Phone of the address. Max length 100 characters. Sortable.

Fields.Name: AddressName
Fields.Description: Address name of the address. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 2. Sortable: priority level 1.

Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the address.

Fields.Name: PriceScheduleID

Fields.Name: IsOnSale
Fields.Description: True when the price schedule and price break has an active SalePrice.

Fields.Name: PriceOverridden
Fields.Description: If true, UnitPrice was overwritten.

Fields.Name: Specs

Fields.Name: IncomingOrderID
Fields.Description: ID of the original order. Only returns a value for the Marketplace Owner.

Fields.Name: OutgoingOrderID

Fields.Name: xp

Endpoints.Name: Get a list of line item across orders

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: buyerID
Parameters.Description: ID of the buyer.

Parameters.Name: supplierID
Parameters.Description: ID of the supplier.

Parameters.Name: from
Parameters.Description: Lower bound of date range that the order was created.

Parameters.Name: to
Parameters.Description: Upper bound of date range that the order was created.

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: searchType
Parameters.Description: Type of search to perform. Possible values: AnyTerm (default), AllTermsAnyField, AllTermsSameField, ExactPhrase, ExactPhrasePrefix.

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'
