Resources.Name: Promotions
Comments: Promotions are used to reduce the cost of a line item or an order.  Promotions can have redemption rules that can be applied for available dates, occurences and value.
Promotions can be assigned to Products, Categories, Buyers, UserGroups and Users for redemption.

Parameters.Name: promotionID
Parameters.Description: ID of the promotion.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the promotion.

Fields.Name: LineItemLevel
Fields.Description: If true, certain eligible expression requirements must be met, and the PromotionDiscount will be applied at the line item level.

Fields.Name: Code
Fields.Description: Must be unique. Entered by buyer when adding promo to order.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the promotion.

Fields.Name: RedemptionLimit
Fields.Description: Limit the total number of orders this promotion can be applied to across all users.

Fields.Name: RedemptionLimitPerUser
Fields.Description: Limit the total number of orders this promotion can be applied to per user.

Fields.Name: RedemptionCount
Fields.Description: The number of times this promotion has been applied to an order.

Fields.Name: ItemLimitPerOrder
Fields.Description: Can only be used when LineItemLevel is true. Limits the number of items the promotion will apply to when eligible. When no ItemSortBy is defined, items will be sorted by DateAdded ascending.

Fields.Name: ItemSortBy
Fields.Description: Comma delimited list of properties to sort by. Can only be used when ItemLimitPerOrder is true. Used to determine the order in which the promotion is applied to the specified limit of items. Use ! to reverse sort order on a property.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the promotion.

Fields.Name: FinePrint
Fields.Description: Terms, conditions, and other legal jargon.

Fields.Name: StartDate
Fields.Description: Start date of the promotion.

Fields.Name: ExpirationDate
Fields.Description: Expiration date of the promotion.

Fields.Name: EligibleExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine if an item or order is eligible for a promotion. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: ValueExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine the discount amount of an eligible promotion. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: CanCombine
Fields.Description: If true, the promotion can be applied to an order that already other promotions applied, as long as they can also be combined.

Fields.Name: AllowAllBuyers
Fields.Description: Allow promo to be used by all buyers in your Marketplace without creating explicit assignments.

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the Promotion. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Fields.Name: AutoApply
Fields.Description: Auto apply of the promotion.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: Active of the promotion.

Fields.Name: Priority
Fields.Description: Used to control the order in which promotions are applied when calling the auto apply endpoint.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the promotion.

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the promotion. Can only contain characters Aa-Zz, 0-9, -, and _. Searchable: priority level 1. Sortable: priority level 2.

Fields.Name: LineItemLevel
Fields.Description: If true, certain eligible expression requirements must be met, and the PromotionDiscount will be applied at the line item level.

Fields.Name: Code
Fields.Description: Must be unique. Entered by buyer when adding promo to order.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the promotion. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 2. Sortable: priority level 1.

Fields.Name: RedemptionLimit
Fields.Description: Limit the total number of orders this promotion can be applied to across all users.

Fields.Name: RedemptionLimitPerUser
Fields.Description: Limit the total number of orders this promotion can be applied to per user.

Fields.Name: ItemLimitPerOrder
Fields.Description: Can only be used when LineItemLevel is true. Limits the number of items the promotion will apply to when eligible. When no ItemSortBy is defined, items will be sorted by DateAdded ascending.

Fields.Name: ItemSortBy
Fields.Description: Comma delimited list of properties to sort by. Can only be used when ItemLimitPerOrder is true. Used to determine the order in which the promotion is applied to the specified limit of items. Use ! to reverse sort order on a property.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the promotion. Max length 2000 characters. Searchable: priority level 4.

Fields.Name: FinePrint
Fields.Description: Terms, conditions, and other legal jargon.

Fields.Name: StartDate
Fields.Description: Start date of the promotion. Sortable.

Fields.Name: ExpirationDate
Fields.Description: Expiration date of the promotion. Sortable.

Fields.Name: EligibleExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine if an item or order is eligible for a promotion. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: ValueExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine the discount amount of an eligible promotion. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: CanCombine
Fields.Description: If true, the promotion can be applied to an order that already other promotions applied, as long as they can also be combined.

Resources.Name: Shipments
Comments: A Shipment is a grouping of one or more Line Items from one or more Orders that is physically packaged and delivered to the Buyer as a single unit. It is typically created by the Marketplace Owner after the Order is submitted as part of the fulfillment process.

Parameters.Name: shipmentID
Parameters.Description: ID of the shipment.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the shipment.

Fields.Name: BuyerID
Fields.Description: ID of the buyer.

Fields.Name: Shipper
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: DateShipped
Fields.Description: In order to properly trigger OrderShipped emails, this date must be NULL on initial POST. Update with the date only when all of the Shipment items have been created. Once all of an order's items exist on a shipment that has a DateShipped the OrderShipped email will trigger and Order.Status will be updated to Complete.

Fields.Name: DateDelivered
Fields.Description: Date delivered of the shipment.

Fields.Name: TrackingNumber
Fields.Description: Tracking number of the shipment.

Fields.Name: Cost
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the Shipment. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the shipment.

Fields.Name: Account
Fields.Description: Account of the shipment.

Fields.Name: FromAddressID
Fields.Description: Marketplace Owner or Supplier AddressID where the product will be shipped from.

Fields.Name: ToAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the to address.

Fields.Name: FromAddress
Fields.Description: From address of the shipment.

Fields.Name: ToAddress
Fields.Description: To address of the shipment.

Fields.Name: DateShipped
Fields.Description: In order to properly trigger OrderShipped emails, this date must be NULL on initial POST. Update with the date only when all of the Shipment items have been created. Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the Shipment. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

Resources.Name: Order Returns
Comments: An OrderReturn represents a transaction between two parties. It can be a record of physical items being returned, or simply a credit being issued not tied to the return of an item.

Parameters.Name: returnID
Parameters.Description: ID of the return.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the order return.

Fields.Name: OrderID
Fields.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Name: PaymentIDs
Fields.Description: IDs of Payments associated with this OrderReturn.

Fields.Name: Status
Fields.Description: Status of the order return. Possible values: Unsubmitted, AwaitingApproval, Declined, Open, Completed, Canceled.

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the order return.

Fields.Name: DateSubmitted
Fields.Description: NULL until the order return passes from the buyer to the Marketplace Owner, including when Status is PendingApproval.

Fields.Name: DateApproved
Fields.Description: Date approved of the order return.

Fields.Name: DateDeclined
Fields.Description: Date declined of the order return.

Fields.Name: DateCanceled
Fields.Description: Date canceled of the order return.

Fields.Name: DateCompleted
Fields.Description: Populated when payment to customer has been completed.

Fields.Name: LastUpdated
Fields.Description: Last updated of the order return.

Fields.Name: RefundAmount
Fields.Description: Refund amount of the order return.

Fields.Name: Comments
Fields.Description: Comments of the order return.

Fields.Name: ItemsToReturn
Fields.Description: Items to return of the order return.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the order return.

Parameters.Description: ID of the return.

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Resources.Name: Seller Approval Rules
Comments: Order return approval rules are used to verify the integrity of an order return. Common examples include order returns exceeding a specified refund amount or order returns that contain no physical items to return. Properties are also available to control the triggers and timing for processing approvals whether parallel to another rule, or in succession of a previous rule.

Endpoints.Name: Get a single seller approval rule

Parameters.Name: approvalRuleID
Parameters.Description: ID of the approval rule.

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization who owns the rule. Only the MPO can write a value other than their own organization ID. The value is used to look up the ApprovingGroupID.

Fields.Name: ApprovalType
Fields.Description: OrderReturn is the only Type supported currently. We plan to expand to Orders in the future.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the seller approval rule.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the seller approval rule.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the seller approval rule.

Fields.Name: ApprovingGroupID
Fields.Description: ID of the approving group.

Fields.Name: RuleExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine an order requires approval. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the seller approval rule.

Resources.Name: Bundle Line Items
Comments: A Bundle represents a group of lines on an Order. At a minimum, each line contains a single Product SKU and a quantity. A line item may also include Spec values, a Cost Center, shipping details, date needed, and other custom information.

Endpoints.Name: Create a new bundle line item
Comments: If ID is provided and an object with that ID already exists, a 409 (conflict) error is returned.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Parameters.Name: bundleID
Parameters.Description: ID of the bundle.

Fields.Name: LineItems
Fields.Description: Line items of the bundle item.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the line item.

Fields.Name: ProductID
Fields.Description: ID of the product.

Fields.Name: Quantity
Fields.Description: Quantity of the line item.

Fields.Name: BundleItemID
Fields.Description: The ID of the Line Item that represents the bundle. Signifies that the Product is being purchased as part of a Bundle.

Fields.Name: IsBundle
Fields.Description: When true, this item represents a Bundle being purchased.

Fields.Name: DateAdded
Fields.Description: Date added of the line item.

Fields.Name: QuantityShipped
Fields.Description: Sum of QuantityShipped from all shipment items.

Fields.Name: UnitPrice
Fields.Description: Auto calculated Price per Quantity. Modification requires OverrideUnitPrice Role.

Fields.Name: PromotionDiscount
Fields.Description: Sum of all line item level promotion discount amounts applied.

Fields.Name: LineTotal
Fields.Description: LineSubtotal - PromotionDiscount

Fields.Name: LineSubtotal
Fields.Description: UnitPrice x Quantity

Fields.Name: CostCenter
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: DateNeeded
Fields.Description: Date needed of the line item.

Fields.Name: ShippingAccount
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the shipping address.

Fields.Name: ShipFromAddressID
Fields.Description: Marketplace Owner or Supplier AddressID where the product will be shipped from. Can be used to calculate shipping costs.

Fields.Name: Product
Fields.Description: Product of the line item.

Fields.Name: Variant
Fields.Description: Variant of the line item.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddress
Fields.Description: Shipping address of the line item.

Fields.Name: ShipFromAddress
Fields.Description: Ship from address of the line item.

Fields.Name: SupplierID
Fields.Description: ID of the supplier.

Fields.Name: InventoryRecordID
Fields.Description: Inventory Record ID of which product inventory location to use. The Inventory Record ID cannot be modified once an order is submitted.

Fields.Name: PriceScheduleID
Fields.Description: ID of the Price Schedule used to determine Unit price.

Fields.Name: IsOnSale
Fields.Description: True when the price schedule and price break has an active SalePrice.

Fields.Name: PriceOverridden
Fields.Description: If true, UnitPrice was overwritten.

Fields.Name: Specs
Fields.Description: Specs of the line item.

Fields.Name: IncomingOrderID
Fields.Description: ID of the original order. Only returns a value for the Marketplace Owner.

Fields.Name: OutgoingOrderID
Fields.Description: ID of the split or forwarded order. Only returns a value for the Marketplace Owner.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the line item.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: Direction of the order, from the current user's perspective. Possible values: incoming, outgoing, all.

Parameters.Name: orderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the order.

Parameters.Name: bundleID
Parameters.Description: ID of the bundle.

Parameters.Name: bundleItemID
Parameters.Description: ID of the bundle item.

Fields.Description: ID of the line item. Can only contain characters Aa-Zz, 0-9, -, and _. Searchable: priority level 1. Sortable.

Fields.Name: ProductID
Fields.Description: ID of the product. Required. Searchable: priority level 2. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Quantity
Fields.Description: Quantity of the line item. Must be at least 1.

Fields.Name: UnitPrice
Fields.Description: Auto calculated Price per Quantity. Modification requires OverrideUnitPrice Role.

Fields.Name: CostCenter
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: DateNeeded
Fields.Description: Date needed of the line item.

Fields.Name: ShippingAccount
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the shipping address.

Fields.Name: ShipFromAddressID
Fields.Description: Marketplace Owner or Supplier AddressID where the product will be shipped from. Can be used to calculate shipping costs.

Fields.Name: InventoryRecordID
Fields.Description: Inventory Record ID of which product inventory location to use. The Inventory Record ID cannot be modified once an order is submitted.

Fields.Name: Specs
Fields.Description: Specs of the line item.

Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the line item.

Parameters.Name: subscriptionID
Parameters.Description: ID of the subscription.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the subscription.

Fields.Name: Frequency
Fields.Description: Used to define how often to process the subscription. The subscription will process once every {Frequency} {Interval}.

Fields.Name: Interval
Fields.Description: Used to define how often to process the subscription. The subscription will process once every {Frequency} {Interval}.

Fields.Name: NextOrderDate
Fields.Description: Next order date of the subscription. The hourly process that creates subscription orders will query for subscriptions with a NextOrderDate between now and five hours ago.

Fields.Name: LastOrderDate
Fields.Description: Last order date of the subscription.

Fields.Name: NotificationDate
Fields.Description: Date that Subscription Order reminder email message sender will be sent if used. Value is the result of NextOrderDate minus NotificationDays on SubscriptionIntegration.

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the subscription.

Fields.Name: EndDate
Fields.Description: End date of the subscription.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: Active of the subscription.

Fields.Name: FromCompanyID
Fields.Description: Only use when creating a subscription on behalf of another user. ID of the Buyer or Marketplace Owner placing the order.

Fields.Name: FromUserID
Fields.Description: Only use when creating a subscription on behalf of a another user.

Fields.Name: ToCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving the order created by this subscription, only writable on create. Mainly useful to the user placing it.

Fields.Name: Payment
Fields.Description: Payment of the subscription.

Fields.Name: BillingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the billing address.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the shipping address.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the subscription.

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

Resources.Name: Me
Comments: "Me" is a container for read-only endpoints that return a filtered view of things that the current buyer user is allowed to see, i.e. things that they are assigned to either directly or as a member of a buyer organization or user group. It also provides ways for a user to update or change their own information.

Fields.Name: Buyer
Fields.Description: Buyer of the user.

Fields.Name: Supplier
Fields.Description: Supplier of the user.

Fields.Name: Seller
Fields.Description: Seller of the user.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the user.

Fields.Name: CompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the company.

Fields.Name: Username
Fields.Description: Must be unique across the Marketplace.

Fields.Name: FirstName
Fields.Description: First name of the user.

Fields.Name: LastName
Fields.Description: Last name of the user.

Fields.Name: Email
Fields.Description: Email of the user.

Fields.Name: Phone
Fields.Description: Phone of the user.

Fields.Name: TermsAccepted
Fields.Description: Terms accepted of the user.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: If false, authentication is prohibited.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the user.

Fields.Name: AvailableRoles
Fields.Description: List of Roles currently available to the user via all SecurityProfile Assignments.

Fields.Name: Locale
Fields.Description: Most specific Locale assigned to the user, if any.

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the user.

Fields.Name: PasswordLastSetDate
Fields.Description: Can be used in conjunction with SecurityProfile.PasswordConfig to enforce password reset schedules.

Endpoints.Name: Update the Currently Authenticated User
Comments: If an object with the same ID already exists, it will be overwritten.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the user. Can only contain characters Aa-Zz, 0-9, -, and _. Searchable: priority level 1. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Username
Fields.Description: Must be unique across the Marketplace.

Fields.Name: Password
Fields.Description: Password of the user.

Fields.Name: FirstName
Fields.Description: First name of the user. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 4. Sortable: priority level 2.

Fields.Name: LastName
Fields.Description: Last name of the user. Required. Max length 100 characters. Searchable: priority level 3. Sortable: priority level 1.

Fields.Name: Email
Fields.Description: Email of the user. Required. Max length 200 characters. Searchable: priority level 5. Sortable.

Fields.Name: Phone
Fields.Description: Phone of the user. Max length 100 characters.

Fields.Name: TermsAccepted
Fields.Description: Terms accepted of the user.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: If false, authentication is prohibited.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the user.

Fields.Name: Buyer
Fields.Description: Buyer of the user.

Fields.Name: Supplier
Fields.Description: Supplier of the user.

Fields.Name: Seller
Fields.Description: Seller of the user.

Fields.Name: ID

Fields.Name: PriceSchedule
Fields.Description: Price schedule of the product.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the product.

Fields.Name: ParentID
Fields.Description: ID of the parent product. If not null, IsParent should be false

Fields.Name: IsParent
Fields.Description: If true, ParentID must be null, as a parent product cannot have a parent itself.

Fields.Name: IsBundle
Fields.Description: If true, IsParent must be false, as a parent product cannot be a bundle.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the product.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the product.

Fields.Name: QuantityMultiplier
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior. Used to indicate an amount per Quantity.

Fields.Name: ShipWeight
Fields.Description: Ship weight of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipHeight
Fields.Description: Ship height of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipWidth
Fields.Description: Ship width of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipLength
Fields.Description: Ship length of the product.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: If false, product is not visible or purchasable from the Shopper perspective.

Fields.Name: SpecCount
Fields.Description: Count of Specs assigned to the product.

Fields.Name: VariantCount
Fields.Description: Count of Variants generated from the product/spec combinations.

Fields.Name: ShipFromAddressID
Fields.Description: Marketplace Owner or Supplier AddressID where the product will be shipped from. Can be used to calculate shipping costs.

Fields.Name: Inventory
Fields.Description: Inventory of the product.

Fields.Name: DefaultSupplierID
Fields.Description: If this property has a value and a SupplierID isn't explicitly passed when creating a LineItem, this SupplierID will be used.

Fields.Name: AllSuppliersCanSell
Fields.Description: If true, all suppliers are eligible to opt into selling this product.

Fields.Name: Returnable
Fields.Description: Returnable of the product.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the product.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the subscription.

Fields.Name: Frequency
Fields.Description: Used to define how often to process the subscription. The subscription will process once every {Frequency} {Interval}.

Fields.Name: Interval
Fields.Description: Used to define how often to process the subscription. The subscription will process once every {Frequency} {Interval}.

Fields.Name: NextOrderDate
Fields.Description: Next order date of the subscription. The hourly process that creates subscription orders will query for subscriptions with a NextOrderDate between now and five hours ago.

Fields.Name: LastOrderDate
Fields.Description: Last order date of the subscription.

Fields.Name: NotificationDate
Fields.Description: Date that Subscription Order reminder email message sender will be sent if used. Value is the result of NextOrderDate minus NotificationDays on SubscriptionIntegration.

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the subscription.

Fields.Name: EndDate
Fields.Description: End date of the subscription.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: Active of the subscription.

Fields.Name: FromCompanyID
Fields.Description: Only use when creating a subscription on behalf of another user. ID of the Buyer or Marketplace Owner placing the order.

Fields.Name: FromUserID
Fields.Description: Only use when creating a subscription on behalf of a another user.

Fields.Name: ToCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving the order created by this subscription, only writable on create. Mainly useful to the user placing it.

Fields.Name: Payment
Fields.Description: Payment of the subscription.

Fields.Name: BillingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the billing address.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the shipping address.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the subscription.

Fields.Description: Used to define how often to process the subscription. The subscription will process once every {Frequency} {Interval}.

Fields.Description: Next order date of the subscription. The hourly process that creates subscription orders will query for subscriptions with a NextOrderDate between now and five hours ago.

Resources.Name: Cost Centers
Comments: "Me" is a container for read-only endpoints that return a filtered view of things that the current buyer user is allowed to see, i.e. things that they are assigned to either directly or as a member of a buyer organization or user group. It also provides ways for a user to update or change their own information.

Endpoints.Name: Get a list of cost centers visible to this user
Comments: Only available to Buyer Users.

Parameters.Name: search
Parameters.Description: Word or phrase to search for.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the cost center.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the cost center.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the cost center.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the cost center.

Parameters.Name: depth
Parameters.Description: Indicates how deep down the hierarchy to return results. Valid values are a number of 1 or greater, or 'all'. Relative to ParentID if specified. Default is 1.

Parameters.Name: catalogID
Parameters.Description: The user’s default CatalogID will be used to return categories if you do not pass another CatalogID explicitly. Listing categories across multiple catalogs is not supported.

Parameters.Name: productID
Parameters.Description: ID of the product.

Parameters.Name: search

Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Name: filters
Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

Fields.Description: ID of the parent category.

Fields.Name: ChildCount
Fields.Description: Number of categories that are *immediate* children of this category.

Fields.Name: PriceSchedule
Fields.Description: Price schedule of the product.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the product.

Fields.Name: ParentID
Fields.Description: ID of the parent product. If not null, IsParent should be false

Fields.Name: IsParent
Fields.Description: If true, ParentID must be null, as a parent product cannot have a parent itself.

Fields.Name: IsBundle
Fields.Description: If true, IsParent must be false, as a parent product cannot be a bundle.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the product.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the product.

Fields.Name: QuantityMultiplier
Fields.Description: For reference only, does not influence any OrderCloud behavior. Used to indicate an amount per Quantity.

Fields.Name: ShipWeight
Fields.Description: Ship weight of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipHeight
Fields.Description: Ship height of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipWidth
Fields.Description: Ship width of the product.

Fields.Name: ShipLength
Fields.Description: Ship length of the product.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: If false, product is not visible or purchasable from the Shopper perspective.

Fields.Name: SpecCount
Fields.Description: Count of Specs assigned to the product.

Fields.Name: VariantCount
Fields.Description: Count of Variants generated from the product/spec combinations.

Fields.Name: ShipFromAddressID
Fields.Description: Marketplace Owner or Supplier AddressID where the product will be shipped from. Can be used to calculate shipping costs.

Fields.Name: Inventory
Fields.Description: Inventory of the product.

Fields.Name: DefaultSupplierID
Fields.Description: If this property has a value and a SupplierID isn't explicitly passed when creating a LineItem, this SupplierID will be used.

Fields.Name: AllSuppliersCanSell
Fields.Description: If true, all suppliers are eligible to opt into selling this product.

Fields.Name: Returnable
Fields.Description: Returnable of the product.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the product.

Endpoints.Name: Get a single product
Comments: Only available to Buyer Users.

Parameters.Name: productID
Parameters.Description: ID of the product.

Parameters.Name: sellerID
Parameters.Description: ID of the seller.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the order.

Fields.Name: FromUser
Fields.Description: User placing the order.

Fields.Name: FromCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Buyer or Marketplace Owner placing the order. Mainly useful to the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving it.

Fields.Name: ToCompanyID
Fields.Description: ID of the Marketplace Owner or Supplier receiving the order, only writable on create. Mainly useful to the user placing it.

Fields.Name: FromUserID
Fields.Description: This property is only writable when creating an order on behalf of a buyer user.

Fields.Name: BillingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the billing address.

Fields.Name: BillingAddress
Fields.Description: Billing address of the order.

Fields.Name: ShippingAddressID
Fields.Description: ID of the Shipping Address for all LineItems on the Order. Null when there are multiple Shipping Addresses involved.

Fields.Name: Comments
Fields.Description: Comments of the order.

Fields.Name: LineItemCount
Fields.Description: Line item count of the order.

Fields.Name: Status
Fields.Description: Status of the order. Possible values: Unsubmitted, AwaitingApproval, Declined, Open, Completed, Canceled.

Fields.Name: DateCreated
Fields.Description: Date created of the order.

Fields.Name: DateSubmitted
Fields.Description: NULL until the order passes from the buyer to the Marketplace Owner, including when Status is PendingApproval.

Fields.Name: DateApproved
Fields.Description: Date approved of the order.

Fields.Name: DateDeclined
Fields.Description: Date declined of the order.

Fields.Name: DateCanceled
Fields.Description: Date canceled of the order.

Fields.Name: DateCompleted
Fields.Description: Populated when all items on an order have shipped, or the order is explicitly completed.

Fields.Name: LastUpdated
Fields.Description: Last updated of the order.

Fields.Name: Subtotal
Fields.Description: Sum of all LineItem.LineSubtotals.

Fields.Name: ShippingCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires OverrideShipping Role.

Fields.Name: TaxCost
Fields.Description: Modifying requires TaxOverride Role.

Fields.Name: PromotionDiscount
Fields.Description: Sum of all Promotion.Amounts applied to the order.

Fields.Name: Currency
Fields.Description: Inherited from the user placing the order.

Fields.Name: Total
Fields.Description: Subtotal + TaxCost + ShippingCost - PromotionDiscount

Fields.Name: IsSubmitted
Fields.Description: True if this Order has been passed from the Buyer to the Marketplace Owner.

Fields.Name: SubscriptionID
Fields.Description: ID of the subscription used to create an order in an automated process.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the order.

Parameters.Name: searchOn
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to search on.

Parameters.Name: sortBy
Parameters.Description: Comma-delimited list of fields to sort by.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page of results to return. Default: 1. When paginating through many items (> page 30), we recommend the "Last ID" method, as outlined in the Advanced Querying documentation.

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 20, max: 100.

Parameters.Description: An object or dictionary representing key/value pairs to apply as filters. Valid keys are top-level properties of the returned model or 'xp.???'

ResponseBody.Sample:
{
  "Meta": {
    "Page": 1,
    "PageSize": 20,
    "TotalCount": 25,
    "TotalPages": 2,
    "ItemRange": [
      1,
      20
    ],
    "NextPageKey": null
  },
  "Items": [
    {
      "ID": "",
      "LineItemLevel": false,
      "Code": "",
      "Name": "",
      "RedemptionLimit": 0,
      "RedemptionLimitPerUser": 0,
      "RedemptionCount": 0,
      "ItemLimitPerOrder": 0,
      "ItemSortBy": "",
      "Description": "",
      "FinePrint": "",
      "StartDate": "2018-01-01T00:00:00-06:00",
      "ExpirationDate": "2018-01-01T00:00:00-06:00",
      "EligibleExpression": "",
      "ValueExpression": "",
      "CanCombine": false,
      "AllowAllBuyers": false,
      "OwnerID": "",
      "AutoApply": false,
      "Active": false,
      "Priority": 0,
      "xp": {}
    }
  ]
}

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the promotion.

Fields.Name: LineItemLevel
Fields.Description: If true, certain eligible expression requirements must be met, and the PromotionDiscount will be applied at the line item level.

Fields.Name: Code
Fields.Description: Must be unique. Entered by buyer when adding promo to order.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the promotion.

Fields.Name: RedemptionLimit
Fields.Description: Limit the total number of orders this promotion can be applied to across all users.

Fields.Name: RedemptionLimitPerUser
Fields.Description: Limit the total number of orders this promotion can be applied to per user.

Fields.Name: RedemptionCount
Fields.Description: The number of times this promotion has been applied to an order.

Fields.Name: ItemLimitPerOrder
Fields.Description: Can only be used when LineItemLevel is true. Limits the number of items the promotion will apply to when eligible. When no ItemSortBy is defined, items will be sorted by DateAdded ascending.

Fields.Name: ItemSortBy
Fields.Description: Comma delimited list of properties to sort by. Can only be used when ItemLimitPerOrder is true. Used to determine the order in which the promotion is applied to the specified limit of items. Use ! to reverse sort order on a property.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the promotion.

Fields.Name: FinePrint
Fields.Description: Terms, conditions, and other legal jargon.

Fields.Name: StartDate
Fields.Description: Start date of the promotion.

Fields.Name: ExpirationDate
Fields.Description: Expiration date of the promotion.

Fields.Name: EligibleExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine if an item or order is eligible for a promotion. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: ValueExpression
Fields.Description: The expression evaluated to determine the discount amount of an eligible promotion. See Rules Engine documentation for formatting details.

Fields.Name: CanCombine
Fields.Description: If true, the promotion can be applied to an order that already other promotions applied, as long as they can also be combined.

Fields.Name: AllowAllBuyers
Fields.Description: Allow promo to be used by all buyers in your Marketplace without creating explicit assignments.

Fields.Name: OwnerID
Fields.Description: ID of the organization that owns the Promotion. Only the Marketplace Owner can override the OwnerID on create.

Fields.Name: AutoApply
Fields.Description: Auto apply of the promotion.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: Active of the promotion.

Fields.Name: Priority
Fields.Description: Used to control the order in which promotions are applied when calling the auto apply endpoint.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the promotion.

Resources.Name: Tracking Events
Comments: Tracking events can be configured for cart, order, and user events that occur in the context of a specific API Client. When these events are triggered by user actions (e.g., adding a line item to a cart), OrderCloud will record specifics about the event and publish a message encapsulating that information so that external systems can be synchronized accordingly. OrderCloud will only publish messages for events that have been configured for the API Client in whose context they occur.

Parameters.Description: ID of the event.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the tracking event.

Resources.Name: Message Senders
Comments: MessageSenders enable the delivery of event driven notifications to users. Each MessageSender handles a group of predefined MessageTypes, which can be assigned to the parties that should receive those emails.

Parameters.Name: messageSenderID
Parameters.Description: ID of the message sender.

Fields.Name: ID
Fields.Description: ID of the message sender.

Fields.Name: Name
Fields.Description: Name of the message sender.

Fields.Name: MessageTypes
Fields.Description: Message types of the message sender.

Fields.Name: Description
Fields.Description: Description of the message sender.

Fields.Name: URL
Fields.Description: URL the MessageSender will POST data to, likely a route within your middleware.

Fields.Name: ElevatedRoles
Fields.Description: If additional data not provided by the message sender is needed, provide any elevated roles needed to make additional calls.

Fields.Name: SharedKey
Fields.Description: Security feature that allows your middleware to verify the digital signature in the request header to ensure you only accept trusted data.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the message sender.

Fields.Name: DeliveryConfigID
Fields.Description: ID of the delivery config.

Fields.Name: AllowAllBuyers
Fields.Description: Allow MessageSender to send to all buyers in your marketplace without creating explicit assignments, defaults to false.

Resources.Name: Subscription
Comments: Required for processing subscription orders. When a subscription is due to be processed, an order, line items, and payment will be created. The order and subscription will be sent to the URL specified in this resource.

Fields.Name: ApiClientID
Fields.Description: ID of the API Client that will be used to generate the token passed to your hosted application via SubscriptionIntegrationPayload.OrderCloudAccessToken.

Fields.Name: HashKey
Fields.Description: Security feature that allows your middleware to verify the digital signature in the request header to ensure you only accept trusted data.

Fields.Name: ElevatedRoles
Fields.Description: Elevated roles of the subscription integration.

Fields.Name: Active
Fields.Description: Active of the subscription integration.

Fields.Name: NotificationDays
Fields.Description: Notification days of the subscription integration.

Fields.Name: Url
Fields.Description: Url of the subscription integration.

Fields.Name: xp
Fields.Description: Container for extended (custom) properties of the subscription integration.
